definitions.title: n.pr.loc
definitions.body: (perh. = [[יְקָמְעָם]] i.e. [[יׇ֫קָם]] [[עָ]] Ol:§ 277k, 3; = let the people be established ? cf. Gray:Prop. N. 218);—in N. Isr. 1Ki 4:12, Loukam, LXXL Oukam; poss. = mod. Tel Ḳaimûn, N. of Megiddo, Buhl:Geogr. 210; city of refuge in Ephr. 1Ch 6:53 ( = [[קִבְחַיִ]] [q.v.] Jos 21:22), Ikaam, Iekmaan, etc.
